game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact and return it to the quest giver.
game.description: Rumor has it that the artifact is hidden deep in the forbidden forest. Be cautious.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical pendant

task.objective: Gather information about the artifact's location from the local villagers.
task.description: Speak to the elder of the village and seek any clues they might have.

task.objective: Enter the forbidden forest and search for the artifact.
task.description: Beware of the guardian spirits that protect the artifact.
